choices.answer: On the edges of the poles
At the edges of a mid-ocean ridge
Near the edges of the ocean basin by the continental shelf
At the part of the ocean basin near the poles
Current from an undersea avalanche of sediment
The cause of a mid-ocean whirlpool
Fast surface current that decreases water clarity
Occurs at the mouth of a river but ends at the shoreline

questions.question: The transition between the shelf and the deep seafloor?

choices.answer: the abyssal plain
the continental slope & rise
the mid-ocean ridge
the submarine canyon

questions.question: Which statement describes an active continental margin

choices.answer: A region of great geological stability
An area where the crust is moving apart
The margin of the Atlantic basin
Area of frequent volcanoes and earthquakes

questions.question: The trailing edge of a moving continent is most likely to exhibit which of the following?

choices.answer: Passive continental margins
Active continental margins
Frequent earthquake activity
Widespread volcanism

questions.question: The characteristics of deep ocean trenches indicate

choices.answer: they are erosional features similar to Grand Canyon
they are glacial troughs dating back to the ice age
they are elongated subduction-related creases
they are canyons cut by turbidity currents

questions.question: The mid-ocean mountains, such as the ridges and rises

choices.answer: are similar in origin to the Alps & Rockies
are constructed of volcanic basalt
are composed of faulted and folded marine sedimentary rock
are similar in size and features to continental mountains

questions.question: The deepest parts of the pacific basin are located

choices.answer: in the center, surrounding the Hawaiian islands
in the rift valley of the eastern Pacific
in the eastern part of the basin, off North America
on the abyssal plains

questions.question: Where are continental shelves the thickest?

choices.answer: Pacific ocean, because margins are active
Pacific ocean, because margins are passive
Atlantic ocean, because margins are active
Atlantic ocean, because margins are passive

questions.question: What assumption would most likely be correct about this picture

choices.answer: two plates are diverging
this is a transform plate boundary
two plates are converging
all of the above

questions.question: If there is no light at hydrothermal vents, how are ecosystems sustained

choices.answer: They eat minerals dissolved in the water
Bacteria uses chemicals to produce carbohydrates
Convert thermal energy into chemical energy, chemosynthesis
All of the above
